name: BATTLE CIRCLES
description:
WARNING : THIS GAME IS A PROTOTYPE. IT MAY OR MAY NOT GET FINISHED AND IT WILL HAVE BUGS. ANY FEEDBACK WOULD BE APPRECIATED.

You and your friends can battle it out with axes and shields. Have fun and defeat your opponents!

Controls:

YOU MUST HAVE A UNITY SUPPORTED GAMEPAD!

Left Stick: Move

A or X: Dash

Right Stick: Move Weapon or Shield

Left Trigger or L2: Use Shield
